item.title: First Post!
item.description: Hello everyone! This is my first blog post! Check out my first project! Check out my second project! Link to google

item.title: R and Python
item.description: Here, I will show how we can use reticulate to demonstrate the ways in which R and Python can work together and use information. This is my last semester at UT, so to wrap up the semester, I will use reticulate to celebrate! Starting off with an R code chunk, we can set the first vector to “Class of 2021”. #R code chunk library(reticulate) year<-"Class of 2021" Now, using a Python code chunk, we can set the second vector to “Graduation”.
